zh.name: 自主智能体设计模式
zh.desc: 开发能够独立根据任务进行规划和执行的 AI 智能体架构。
zh.full_desc: 深入了解 AutoGPT、BabyAGI 等系统的底层逻辑。该技能介绍了如自主规划（Planning）、记忆管理（Memory）和工具调用（Tool Use）等核心设计模式，帮助你构建能够像人类一样思考并执行复杂任务的智能机器人。

en.name: Autonomous Agent Patterns
en.desc: Developing AI agent architectures that plan and execute tasks independently.
en.full_desc: Dive deep into the logic behind systems like AutoGPT. This skill covers core design patterns like self-reflection, memory management, and tool-use, enabling you to build AI agents capable of planning and executing complex tasks without constant human input.
